title: La Benz Patent-Motorwagen
description: Considered the first automobile with an internal combustion engine, designed by Karl Benz.

title: Ford Model T
description: The first mass-produced car, making automobiles accessible to the general public.

title: The era of tailfins
description: Cars adopted futuristic designs with huge tailfins, inspired by the space age.

title: First car with airbag
description: The Oldsmobile Toronado introduced the first airbag safety system.

title: Toyota Prius
description: The first mass-produced hybrid car, marking the beginning of the era of eco-friendly vehicles.

title: Autonomous cars
description: Self-driving vehicles begin to be tested on roads, promising to revolutionize transportation.
